content: See, for example, docs#Homeomorph.addLeft.proof_1. I originally found this with docs#continuous_of_continuousAt_zeroâ‚‚.match_1, I have a feeling the linkifier isn't going to work on that
Note there aren't mulLeft counterpart of these lemmas. Probably there are some mechanism to delete these auxiliary auto-generated lemmas which doesn't pick up the additivized lemmas.
